MembershipPlans.Name: Basic Plan
MembershipPlans.Description: Our Basic plan offers essential gym access with cardio and strength equipment. Ideal for those seeking a budget-friendly fitness option.

MembershipPlans.Name: Premium Plan
MembershipPlans.Description: Elevate your fitness with our Premium plan. Enjoy full gym access, unlimited group classes, and premium amenities like saunas and relaxation areas.

MembershipPlans.Name: Elite Plan
MembershipPlans.Description: Experience ultimate luxury and convenience with our Elite plan. Enjoy all the benefits of the Premium plan plus exclusive perks such as priority equipment access and complimentary refreshments.
